title.rendered: STATEMENT: Stacey Abrams on Statewide Runoff Results, Democratic Ticket

content.rendered:
ATLANTA — Today, Democratic nominee for Governor, Stacey Abrams, issued the following statement following the announcement of Georgia’s statewide runoff results: 

“Charlie Bailey, Bee Nguyen and William Boddie are exemplary leaders who share a deep commitment to serving all Georgians. I congratulate them on their runoff victories and look forward to working alongside them, Janice Laws Robinson and the entire Democratic ticket to build One Georgia where everyone has the opportunity to thrive. I also offer my gratitude to those candidates who stepped up to serve our state,” said Stacey Abrams. “While Republicans focus on extreme and reckless policies that put more guns on our streets, ban women’s access to reproductive healthcare and drive teachers from the classroom, Democrats will work together toward victory and lead Georgia to its next and greatest chapter.”

###
